|rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "0500-2140421200" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Linksys|U-MEDIA}} {{WiFiCert|WFA56813|12/08/2014}} :The WFA certification indicates this device is using '''Linux'''. ==Links of Interest== ===Additional support=== *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=136673 Getting to know the Linksys N600 Pro Wi-Fi Range Extender, RE4100W] *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=143720 Using the Linksys Range Extenders, RE6700, RE4100W, RE6500 and RE6500HG wireless music playback feature] ==See also== [http://www.linksys.com/us/range-extenders/c/wireless-wi-fi-range-extenders/ Wireless Range Extenders]
[[List of Linksys Wireless Devices#Repeaters/Range Extenders|Repeaters/Range Extenders]] *[[Linksys RE1000]] N300 Wi-Fi Range Extender *[[Linksys RE2000]] N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE2000 v2]] Wireless-N Range Extender *[[Linksys RE3000W]] N300 Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE4000W]] N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *Linksys RE4100W N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6500]] AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6500HG]] AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6700]] AC1200 AMPLIFY Dual-Band Wi-Fi Range Extender [[Category:English Documentation]]
